panels.description: Number of all queries. Shows the last value
panels.title: Query Count Total

panels.description: Average query response time for all query types
panels.title: Avg response time

panels.description: Cache Hit/Miss ratio. 100 % means, all queries could be answered from the cache, 0% - all queries must be resolved via external DNS
panels.title: Cache Hit/Miss ratio

panels.description: Number of entries in the cache. Shows the last value
panels.title: Cache entries count

panels.description: Amount of performed DNS queries to prefetch cached queries
panels.title: Prefetch count

panels.description: Amount of unique domains in the prefetched cache
panels.title: Prefetch domain count

panels.description: Amount of prefetch queries per minute
panels.title: Prefetch rate per min

panels.description: How many of cached entries were prefetched automatically
panels.title: Prefetch Hit ratio
